ratings.en: Hora, danshan no môgen/Tôkumi wa mondai no ôi kyôshitsu desu kara dôka soko wa goryôshô kudasai
Mada ake hajimeshi maegami no/Tifanî de sôshoku o/Atarashikunai hito yo mezameyo
Kimi shiritamô koto nakare/Yume nashi no hôichi no hanashi/Inpeisotsu
Bunka Keizu/Watashi wa sono Hito o Tsune ni Nokorimono to Yonde Ita/Onkise no Kanata ni
Chakuriku no Sakae/Aru Onna Yaku/Nami ni Nottekuru Pororokka
Hyakumankai Iwareta Neko/Akazukin-chan, neru. Ki o Tsukete/Tsugaru Tsushin Kyoiku
Junana-sai ne, jibun no shiwa o tsukande mitaku nai?/Gimu to Heitai/Saratto iu na!' to Merosu wa, ikiritatte hanbaku shita
Kamakura Myohonji Kaiko/Daidoji Shinsuke no Onsei/Aniimoto, to iu Zentei de
Kuroi Juni-nin no Zetsubo shojo/Kongetsu Kon'ya Kono Tsuki ga Boku no Namida de Kumorimasu Yoni
Pin yori konbi no hou ga eeiukoto Dessharo
Rekka Ryusui/Chijin no Ari/Ichigen no Joken
Robo no eshi/Hazukashii hon Bakari Yondekimashita/Usume no Natsu
Supainatsu Purin/Bakuro no mi no Jukusuru Toki/Hanbun Torimonocho
